original_title: Tumhare Hum Kaun Hai: A Love Arranged Story
overview: It's a story of a middle-class girl who wished to marry Top Actor Salman Khan or a person who looks like, Salman Khan. But her family decides to arrange marriage and she is stuck with the man she doesn't like.
tagline: Love is not a matter of personality or appearance, but two words of affection. This is a story of acceptance of true love.
title: Tumhare Hum Kaun Hai: A Love Arranged Story
